definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: Psoriasis is a common chronic inflammatory skin disease that is usually managed in outpatient clinic.
sentences.chinese: 乾癬爲常見之慢性發炎性皮膚疾病，通常在門診治療。
